name: Blazing Holy Sword Equip, Stravairina

effect: Power200Skill30Finishing Attack:PinchingSuper Finishing Attack:"Bull Lock"

effect: Power200Skill30Finishing Attack:ThrowingSuper Finishing Attack:"Rolling Driver"
flavor: The world's largest and strongest beetle which can grip and lift opponents using its two horns. It loves the sap of a certain palm tree in a jungle.

name: Elephant Beetle
effect: Power160Skill60Finishing Attack:HittingSuper Finishing Attack:"Dragon Attack"

effect: Power160Skill60Finishing Attack:ThrowingSuper Finishing Attack:"Sidescrew Throw"

name: Five Horned Beetle
